comment.language: The priest offers incense before the icon of the Crucifixion, saying:
Imam mempersembahkan dupa di depan ikon Penyaliban sambil berkata:

text.language: Tenouwst m~mok w~ Pi,~rictoc: nem pekc~tauroc n~reftanqo: v/etauask e~h~r/i e~jwf sa n~tekcotten qen nennobi.
We worship You, O Christ, and Your life-giving cross, upon which You were crucified to deliver us from our sins.
Kami menyembah Engkau, ya Kristus, dan salib-Mu yang memberi hidup, yang di atasnya Engkau disalibkan untuk membebaskan kami dari dosa-dosa kami.
نسجد لكَ أيها المسيح ولصليبك المحيي الذى صلبت عليه حتى خلصتنا من خطايانا.
Pa[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: v/etauask epic~tauroc: eke~qomqen m~p~catanac: capec/t n~nen[alauj.
My Lord Jesus Christ, who was crucified upon the Cross trampling Satan under our feet.
Tuhanku Yesus Kristus, yang disalibkan di atas kayu Salib menginjak-injak Setan di bawah kaki kita.
يا ربى يسوع المسيح يا من صلبت علی الصليب اسحق الشيطان تحت أقدامنا.
<ere pic~tauroc: e~taues p~ouro Pi,~rictoc: sa n~tefcw] m~mon: e~bolqen nennobi.
Hail to the Cross, upon which Christ the King was crucified, to save us from our sins.
Salam bagi Salib, di mana Kristus Sang Raja disalibkan, untuk menyelamatkan kita dari dosa-dosa kita.
السلام للصليب الذى صلب عليه الملك المسيح حتى خلصنا من خطايانا.
